DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate impact provide newly diagnose prostate cancer patient caregiver interactive mobile tablet technology-based application deliver community navigator versus provide National Cancer Institute ( NCI ) information booklet deliver Community Navigator ( CN ) patient outcome ( decisional satisfaction , quality life , knowledge , decisional conflict ) share decision making practice ( decision make involvement ) .
DOC.criteria: Men newly diagnose ( within 6 month ) biopsy confirm case prostate cancer 40 80 year age Able speak read English Live within 120 mile healthcare treatment facility Have document observable visual , auditory , psychiatric , neurological disorder would interfere study participation Be able complete telephone interview Have complete first course treatment Have family member/caregiver willing participate Capable provide write consent study participation . Men diagnose early stage , locally advanced metastatic disease men active surveillance eligible participate study . Caregiver must age 18 old Caregiver must identify patient caregiver ( i.e. , provider emotional and/or physical care ) Caregiver must diagnose cancer previous year receive cancer treatment
